description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in HPE Integrated Lights-Out 5 (iLO 5) and Integrated Lights-Out 6 (iLO 6). The vulnerability could be remotely exploited to allow authentication bypass.

product.name: HPE Integrated Lights-out 5 (iLO 5), HPE Integrated Lights-out 6 (iLO 6),

enisaIdProduct.product_version: iLO 6 - v1.05 through versions prior to v1.55

product.name: HPE Integrated Lights-out 5 (iLO 5), HPE Integrated Lights-out 6 (iLO 6),

enisaIdProduct.product_version: iLO 5 - v2.63 through versions prior to v3.00
